summary: Comprehensive testing of PrizeWheel Pro multi-tenant gamification SaaS platform completed. Backend API shows 100% success rate (21/21 endpoints), frontend shows 95% functionality working with one critical game interaction issue.

ui_bugs.issue: SPIN button on /play/summer-spin is not clickable despite form being filled and consent checkbox appearing checked
ui_bugs.details: Element shows as not enabled in Playwright, preventing core game functionality

integration_issues.issue: Form validation preventing spin button activation

passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero section, features, pricing cards
Admin login and dashboard with stats display
Tenant login and dashboard with campaign overview
Sidebar navigation with correct role-based links
Cookie banner shows with Accept/Reject/Manage options
Public game page loads with wheel component and form
Game API endpoint for playing games
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix critical issue: Game SPIN button not clickable on public game page (/play/summer-spin). The button appears disabled even when form is properly filled and consent is checked. This blocks the core game functionality that users need to play and win prizes.
